Privacy Policy

Introduction

At FreeInvoiceGenerator.com, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our free invoice generator service.

âœ… No Data Collection

We do not collect, store, or track any personal information including names, email addresses, phone numbers, or IP addresses.

ğŸ”’ No Data Storage

All invoices are generated locally in your browser and are not stored on our servers or any third-party systems.

ğŸŒ No Cookies or Tracking

Our site does not use cookies, analytics, or any tracking technologies. Your use of the site is completely anonymous.

ğŸ“„ Invoice Data

Any invoice data you create is stored only temporarily in your browser memory and is cleared once you close the tab.

ğŸ“± Fully Client-Side

The entire invoice generation process happens in your browser. No data is sent to or processed by any external server.

ğŸ” Secure by Design

Since we never collect or store data, there's no risk of data breaches, leaks, or misuse of your personal information.

Have Questions?

If you have any questions about our privacy practices, feel free to reach out via our contact page. We're always happy to help!

About Us

We provide a free, fast, and user-friendly invoice generator to help freelancers and small businesses create professional invoices in seconds.
